wind_maintenance.title: Wind Turbine Maintenance
wind_maintenance.description: Comprehensive maintenance solutions for wind turbines, ensuring optimal performance and longevity. Our expert teams provide scheduled inspections, repairs, and upgrades tailored to client needs.

sections.heading: Service Overview
sections.text: We offer a full range of wind turbine maintenance services, including blade inspection, gearbox repairs, and electrical system checks. Our certified technicians use advanced diagnostic tools to identify and resolve issues quickly.

sections.heading: Key Benefits
sections.text:
- Increased turbine efficiency
- Reduced downtime
- Extended equipment lifespan
- Compliance with industry standards

sections.heading: Our Approach
sections.text: Our maintenance process is designed to minimize disruption and maximize safety. We work closely with clients to schedule interventions and provide detailed reports after each service.

wind_maintenance_onshore.title: Onshore Wind Maintenance & Repair
wind_maintenance_onshore.description: We provide on-site maintenance services for onshore wind turbines, especially focusing on blade inspections and upkeep. Our teams travel directly to the turbine sites to keep the systems running safely and efficiently.

wind_repair_offshore.title: Offshore Wind Maintenance & Repair
wind_repair_offshore.description: We specialize in repairing offshore wind turbines, particularly damaged or worn-out blades. Our technicians are trained to work in challenging marine environments like the sea or ocean.

corrosion_protection.title: Corrosion Protection Services
corrosion_protection.description: We provide corrosion protection for steel structures, tanks, pipelines, and industrial facilities. Our services include sandblasting, coating, and long-term surface preservation for onshore and offshore environments.

factory_services.title: Factory Services
factory_services.description: We supply skilled workers to support manufacturing processes in various factories. In blade factories, our services include laminating, sanding, and painting. For corrosion protection plants, we provide certified inspectors, sandblasters, airless painters, and more.

skilled_teams.title: Skilled Teams for Blade Production
skilled_teams.description: Our experienced teams support blade manufacturing with precision and efficiency. We cover all stages—lamination, bonding, sanding, and final assembly—for high-quality rotor blades.

rodopi_solar.title: RODOPI Solar
rodopi_solar.description: We offer full-service solar solutions—from manpower and materials to equipment and installation. Our teams handle everything from A to Z for solar panel projects.

building_infrastructure.title: Building & Infrastructure Maintenance
building_infrastructure.description: We carry out concrete work and repairs for structures like tunnels, parking garages, streets, and bridges. We also offer asphalt work for road surfaces and public areas.

rodopi_academy.title: RODOPI Academy
rodopi_academy.description: Our training center offers certified courses, including GWO (Global Wind Organisation) training, working-at-height training, sandblasting, blade repair, and safety certifications.

hr_workforce.title: HR & Workforce Solutions
hr_workforce.description: We handle all aspects of workforce logistics—contracts, accommodation, transportation, hotel bookings, and rental cars—for our teams and clients across Europe.

rodopi_tools.title: RODOPI Tools

InfoCompany.subtitle: RODOPI is a leading European provider of renewable energy services, specializing in wind and solar solutions and maintenance of infrastructure.
InfoCompany.history_text: Founded in 2006 in industrial coatings and corrosion protection, RODOPI has grown into a multi-disciplinary group in Europe's renewable energy and infrastructure sectors. Since becoming RODOPI GmbH in 2010, we've expanded across wind and solar, blade manufacturing, training, and maintenance—driving sustainable growth through quality and expertise.

GeneralExplanation.subtitle: Powering the Future with Smart Renewable Solutions
GeneralExplanation.body: RODOPI is a leading European provider of renewable energy services, specializing in wind and solar solutions and infrastructure maintenance. We help businesses boost performance through expert wind turbine maintenance, tower and blade repair, corrosion protection, concrete repair, and complete turnkey solar installations.

GeneralContractor.subtitle: Ensuring Performance and Longevity
GeneralContractor.body: From rotor blade repair to tower maintenance and advanced inspections, RODOPI ensures your wind turbines operate at peak efficiency. Our certified technicians deliver reliable, long-term solutions tailored to your needs.

CorrosionProtection.subtitle: Always the Right Approach
CorrosionProtection.body: From inspections and blade repair to tower coating and mechanical upgrades – we provide tailored solutions to keep your wind turbines running at their best.
CorrosionProtection.point1_body: RODOPI’s Wind Maintenance & Repair services cover every critical component of a wind turbine. Our teams perform visual, drone-based, and lightning protection system inspections—both on the ground and via rope access. We specialize in GFRP (glass fiber reinforced plastic) repairs using epoxy or polyester, covering everything from blade cracks and bonding issues to nacelle and hub structure restoration. In addition, we install performance-enhancing components like vortex generators and sensors. On the tower side, we handle dent repairs, vibration mitigation, and high-grade anti-corrosion coatings. Our electrical and mechanical experts work on heating systems, retrofits, brake pads, generators, winches, lifts, pumps, and lubrication systems. With RODOPI, you get holistic maintenance with a focus on energy output and turbine longevity.
